column4: Ppl I got a graphic card Intel 915GM and Im using i810 driver.. got 1080fps on glxgears and glxinfo shows that direct rendering is enable.. but I cant play video files correct.. it breaks alot... How can I solve this?
I searched everywhere about this.. I even heard about a dri-i915 driver file but its a .rpm I tried converting it with alien and install it but still nothing works
Anyone with a 915GM graphic card with 128mb shared working 100% ?
you gave your on board graphics controller 128megs?
you should tone that mem down a bit, it's shared memory so you are just using up memory that could be used for applicaions or cache.
but still.. there is a way of putting it to work
yast, look at the driver's docs, there should be a section on memory
the problem is that I get 1080 fps on glxgears and glxinfo show direct rendering enable
i'm getting ~700fps with glxgears using my 855gme video
